jobInfo.jobName: UX Research Intern 需有英文基礎
jobInfo.postDescription:
Learn more about us at www.uxspot.cn

We’re seeking a UX Researcher Intern to join our UX Spot team (part of the Digital Creative agency) in Shanghai. We're a UX research agency specializing in testing, measuring, and optimizing user and customer experiences in the digital and physical world. We have a UX lab built in our office for in-person research and observation and have built many digital tools and apps for remote research. Our clients are the leading companies in the world, exploring the most innovative new solutions to build the products of tomorrow.


As a UX Research Intern, you will participate in and support a wide range of exciting qualitative, quantitative, and usability research projects that help the team explore new ideas and evaluate product concepts, ultimately influencing important business and product decisions.


The successful applicant will be working alongside extremely talented UX researchers, UI designers, app and web developers in a flexible and relaxed working environment - with a focus on using UX to help our clients create products for their users.
 

Responsibilities

 

Support senior researchers in all aspects of research projects, from project kick-off to reporting
Assist the development of research materials including screeners, concepts, and discussion guides
Coordinate participant scheduling for research projects
Program, test, and coordinate the fielding of usability tests and surveys
Conduct secondary research and competitive analysis
Conduct research recording analysis and video footage edits
Observation and note-taking

Actively discover & maintain online & offline participant recruitment channels, including but not limited to clubs, communities, forums, KOLs, QQ/WeChat groups, Weibo, Baidu

Must be fluent in English & Chinese. 


Working hours: 11 am – 7 pm
jobInfo.address: 上海黄浦区昂云空间307室

brandComInfo.introduce:
We plan, design & execute online campaigns that deliver results.

Digital Creative成立于2011年，是一家独立外资公司，国际化的工作氛围让你能感受到来自世界各国的文化冲击。公司主营用户调研、UX/UI设计、前后端开发。办公室坐落于浦东新区杨高南路沿河岸旁的创意园区内。我们有国内顶尖的设计师和开发工程师团队。

我们的客户: 保时捷中国、瑞士银行，Agoda，LVMH集团，微软中国、迪士尼、戴森电气、华住会、联想、卡巴斯基、英国领事馆、Vice中国、芮欧百货等

灵活工作时间：公司早上11点上班，每天都能睡懒觉
不定期薪资提升：对工作能力的肯定直接体现到薪水上
不定期团队派对：节假日、员工生日、项目结尾都会有团队聚餐等活动
零食饮料无限供应：办公室内超大茶水间，零食饮料随便拿
工作做好，更要玩的好：办公室配备飞镖室、PS游戏机，下班了玩把2K再走？
学习就是力量：公司设立图书角，你想看什么书，我们就给你买什么书
健康其实很重要：办公室内多达100余株绿植，5台空气净化器，再也不用担心辐射和雾霾了

我们找的并非只是甘于行尸走肉般活着的机器人
我们要的是可以和我们携手一起勇于创新突破从而颠覆自我认知的战略合作伙伴
